data.body: Backfill newly added settings for existing installs, with focus on automated review post-prompt settings. Ensure foolery start/restart backfills missing keys without overwriting existing user values. Add a foolery doctor check that detects missing settings defaults and offers an auto-fix to write missing keys.

data.title: Backfill missing automated review post-prompt setting on startup and via doctor
